thread.section_title: Millesime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Hotel, fantastic location!
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel, fantastic location! - Review of Millesime Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leah M
title: Lovely Hotel, fantastic location!
text:
My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel for my birthday and the experience was a delight! We were greeted by the desk manager upon arrival late at night, he was very friendly and offered great advice! The hotel found out it was my birthday and sent a lovely bottle of champagne to the room.
The Superior Suite was perfect: clean, cosy and the bed was very comfortable. The bathroom was also very clean and the shower was amazing.
The location is fantastic, many sites are within walking distance and many buses can be found nearby.
Overall, this hotel was fantastic! I would definitely recommend!
